lyrics.line: I can hear the pouring rain
So familiar in my ears
I can feel the burning flame
Bringing memories so near
I can see the distant light
Calling me from far away
I can see it in your eyes
Another day, another story
You wonder why you don't see me
Another second, so softly
Passing as a mystery
If I say that I don't miss you anymore
I'd be lying, so maybe
I love you after all
Oh, have I said this before?
That I love you after all
Do you recall
The time when I was yours?
(When I was yours)
I can hear the pouring rain
So cold on my skin
I wonder if it'd be okay
If you warmed me with a kiss
I look to the sky above
With your jacket in my arms
Oh, the clouds seem so close
Somehow I'm not alarmed
I can feel your distant warmth
I can see your distant silhouette
I hear what you once said
Another day that I'll be waiting
I know that you're still watching
Another second, I remember that your heart is beating
Oh, I hold on to your everlasting love
And I know, you've never left
Since the day I was yours
I'm yours forevermore
I love you after all
I'm yours forevermore
I love you after all
